text: Nancy Cleeland is an American journalist. She won a 2004 Pulitzer Prize for National Reporting. and 2004 George Polk Award. She works for Economic Policy Institute. She studied at University of Arizona. She worked for the Associated Press and the Los Angeles Times. == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:American journalists Category:Pulitzer Prize winners
title: Nancy Cleeland
